channel.title: Error when running 718
channel.description:
Everytime i run the run.bat i keep getting this error:
[img]http://gyazo.com/159ac1bf253fca35f54469c78828302e.png?1342116487[/img] [code]Error: missing `server' JVM at `C:\Program Files\Java\jre7\bin\server\jvm.dll'. Please install or use the JRE or JDK that contains these missing components. Tryck ned valfri tangent för att fortsätta...[/code]
What is it possible to do?

item.title: Error when running 718
item.dc:creator: @siz siz
item.description:
@siz wrote:

[quote=“Rilex, post:1, topic:449394”]Everytime i run the run.bat i keep getting this error:

Error: missing `server' JVM at `C:\Program Files\Java\jre7\bin\server\jvm.dll'. Please install or use the JRE or JDK that contains these missing components. Tryck ned valfri tangent för att fortsätta...

What is it possible to do?[/quote]
Did you direct your run.bat to your jdk?

Read full topic
